description: Non-material amendment to remove condition 20 attached to 15F/0288 (To erect new halls of residence and refurbish Derby Old Court (1361 bedrooms in total with ancillary support accommodation) comprising 4-8 storey buildings following demolition of 7 buildings, to erect 2 storey sports hall and sports pavilion, layout sports pitches/facilities (hard and soft) and erect MUGA, to carry out hard and soft landscaping works and alterations to boundary wall, erect sub-station, layout associated parking areas and create new vehicular access to North Mossley Hill Road with ancillary works) so as to remove the need to transplant trees
site_address: Greenbank Student Village, Greenbank Lane, Liverpool, L17 1AG
